CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aether Market relative to Echo Trade?
SRP.A: Aether Market is {above} Echo Trade in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Crimson Bazaar relative to Starfall Mart?
SRP.A: Crimson Bazaar is {above} Starfall Mart in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Ironwood Market relative to Starfall Mart?
SRP.A: Ironwood Market is {above} Starfall Mart in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total home sales?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Echo Trade}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total home sales?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Starfall Mart}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Crimson Bazaar's maximum Home Sales in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Crimson Bazaar's maximum Home Sales is in {2002}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Echo Trade's minimum Home Sales in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Echo Trade's minimum Home Sales is in {1974}.

NC.Q: Between 1984 and 1986, did the total Home Sales experience a larger or smaller change than between 1991 and 2001?
NC.A: The change in total home sales between 1984 and 1986 was {smaller} than between 1991 and 2001.

NC.Q: Between 1985 and 1987, did the total Home Sales experience a larger or smaller change than between 1974 and 1981?
NC.A: The change in total home sales between 1985 and 1987 was {smaller} than between 1974 and 1981.

NC.Q: Between 1979 and 1985, did the total Home Sales experience a larger or smaller change than between 1981 and 1983?
NC.A: The change in total home sales between 1979 and 1985 was {larger} than between 1981 and 1983.

NC.Q: Between 1985 and 2000, was the average total Home Sales higher or lower than between 1981 and 1982?
NC.A: The average total home sales between 1985 and 2000 was {higher} than between 1981 and 1982.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Echo Trade} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Echo Trade and Starfall Mart first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Echo Trade and Starfall Mart did not exchange leading positions.
